remarks: Inference for combining cases.  (Contributed by NM, 29-Jul-1999.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 6-Jan-2013.)
statement:
ccase.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ta ) $.
ccase.2 $e |- ( ( ch /\ ps ) -> ta ) $.
ccase.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ th ) -> ta ) $.
ccase.4 $e |- ( ( ch /\ th ) -> ta ) $.
ccase $p |- ( ( ( ph \/ ch ) /\ ( ps \/ th ) ) -> ta ) $.
